snippet: Mitt Romney sought to play down the latest jobs numbers - a 7.8 percent unemployment rate, the lowest since 2009 - telling the crowd that the rate had come down "very, very slowly."
abstract: Mitt Romney sought to play down the latest jobs numbers - a 7.8 percent unemployment rate, the lowest since 2009 - telling the crowd that the rate had come down "very, very slowly."

headline.main: Romney Says Jobs Numbers Are Not True Sign of Growth
